website_summaries.verdict: The best set of neodymium magnets for home and DIY projects needing extra-strength magnets.
pros: Set comes with large bars of neodymium magnets
Each magnet is thick for extra sticking power and longevity
cons: Magnets can break when pulling them apart from the stack

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Handy Magnets
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality magnets. Do realize the shiny coat to the magnet is extremely think and the actual magnet itself is brittle. You will want to take extra precaution when using the magnets so two don't hit each other. They will break somewhat easily. Unless you've read this review and know to be really careful with them. They aren't toys and will pinch you if you are careless. If you need a good magnet and handle these with care, you'll be quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BostonsPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The item description is correct; they are very strong! I needed some for my work bench to stick blue prints on the board and they hold even manuals in place. I think half of one of those would be already strong enough. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: supp

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong! 10/10, I do recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I wrapped some with electrical tape and some with duct tape, different amount of wraps for different strengths. Reason being, they were a little too strong for certain things. One bar wrapped three times with electric tape holds both, but not at the same time obviously, my pistol or revolver underneath the table. May wrap it a couple more times as my revolver is a bit lighter than my pistol and is kind of hard to draw as the magnets are just wickedly strong! 10/10, would recommend. (Also I wrap them mainly so they don’t A) scratch my stuff and B) break. These magnets are prone to breaking if they clank too hard, and they are crazy strong
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Be smart
customer_reviews.text: Great magnets when you know a few things about them 1) they're brittle don't let them snap together 2) these are really ****ing strong even though they're small, don't let kids play with them basicly ages 18+ 3) If they didn't come broken or with cracks and they break it's your fault 4)don't use these magnets to pick up other magnets of the same type or weaker ones pick it up with your hands you lazy *s*
customer_reviews.author: chinochi

customer_reviews.title: Smooth powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Really strong and smooth . I don't have a use for them other than amusement But I'm glad I bought them .
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping oven door closed!
customer_reviews.text: These very strong magnets perfectly solved my problem. My over door is slightly warped and does not want to close completely. Had major repairs done last year that helped the door to close, but then problem re-appeared. After brainstorming solutions I tried some small neodymium magnets from a store, but they were not strong enough. These bars were perfect. I used two stacks of two and now the oven door closes perfectly and securely. Now the oven heats quickly because it doesn't cycle on & off due to an barely open door.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: they crumble
customer_reviews.text: These are super strong magnets. I was very impressed when I first opened them. After I tried pulling them apart a few of the magnets crumbled and fell apart unfortunately. They are so cheap so I won't bother returning them but I just wanted to give a heads up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so strong that they can injure you. UPDATE: got improperly packageed 2nd set
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are almost too strong! For their small size they are deceptively powerful. I did the mistake of getting 2 of these too close together and they pinched the cr..p of my fingers causing a bleed under the skin! UPDATE: I ordered a second set, which unfortunately were not packed correctly. 2 pair of magnets did NOT have the small insulating plastic dividers, which makes it nearly impossible to separate the magnets!! It is already difficult to separate these with the dividers, but without them there is NO way to separate these without strong tools. I used pliers and vice grips to try to prior 1 pair apart, and ended up shattering 1 magnet, as they are brittle.
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Super Fragile!
customer_reviews.text: These are super strong magnets, but super fragile as well. Just letting them snap together shatters them into many sharp fragments. Out of the two packages I bought, Ive only got 5 or 6 individual magnets that are unbroken. And several broke just getting the apart the first time. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly strong. Probably too strong for many purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how strong these magnets are. They easily attract and stick in place even through a cabinet door or a hand. Without attaching them to something else they are basically unusable as refrigerator magnets because they are so incredibly hard to remove from the refrigerator. That being said, I think they would be awesome as components in crafts, or for hanging cutlery or other tools. I like what another reviewer suggested about attaching them to wood. Also I thought about sewing them into pouches or toys, but honestly they're so strong I think they might rip through the fabric unless you padded the magnets before inserting them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hoherd

customer_reviews.title: Strong but Brittle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets to help hold up a magnetic knife block on my fridge. The magnets worked great in that aspect, the block now holds steady with the knives on it and doesn’t slide down the fridge. The magnets are incredibly strong. The only thing I wish I knew ahead of time is how brittle these magnets are. I put them on the fridge and they pulled together so fast that two of them smashed/broke in half. I wish I would have known beforehand how gentle you have to be with these magnets to ensure they don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bean

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled into pieces minutes after opening package
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to using these in a project. Will have to find a last minute and probably much more expensive alternative as these are too fragile to do anything useful with. I should have paid closer attention to the other reviewers having the same trouble.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the size fool you!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful little magnets if you’re not used to dealing with Magnets be aware that these will hop out of your hand, and slam into each other so powerfully they break! Pieces my shatter could cause eye damage! Slide each one forward and pry it up, keep them as far away from each other as possible, or they will attract, and become projectiles? It will happen before you know it. I broke 4 of 10, so don’t say nobody told you! These are not toys they’re serious magnets!
customer_reviews.author: Pleasure

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are STRONG magnets and you can easily hurt yourself if you get your fingers between 2 of them - and this is easier to do than you think! Be careful to keep them separate when using them as they will snap together faster than you can move your fingers! But, this is what is good about them - they are STRONG magnets while still being so small. They come in stacks that make it difficult to separate them from each other.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Now that's a magnet.
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these darned things because they're so useful. In my 63-year-old house, the window screens didn't work well. They didn't adhere to the windows, the frames were crooked, modern screen replacement kits didn't work well--so having used these magnets for other tasks, I carefully cut window screening replacement, hemmed it, and attached it to the metal frames using these magnets. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jude2004

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are extremely powerful...to the point that one must be careful while using them. That said; they were perfect for my needs. I used them to make a red oak magnetic knife holder and it turned out beautifully. I couldn't be more pleased. I routed out a strip on the backside of the board and glued in two layers of these magnets. Finished the wood with oil based urethane and hung it on my kitchen wall. Voila!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not a toy
customer_reviews.text: Look, these are magnets and you know what they do but I write this to let you know these are not toys and they are so powerful they can hurt. If you are looking for some magnets for your child's project look for something else. These magnets are hard to separate and fragile. Once they are within each others magnetic field they will snap with extreme force. If your finger or hand gets trapped in between IT WILL RIP SKIN (I know now).
customer_reviews.author: trump is dumb

customer_reviews.title: Ow!
customer_reviews.text: Be CAREFUL with those things, silly! They'll pinch the SNOT out of you! Really. They can HURT you. They're also the devil himself to peel apart from each other, so KEEP the plastic between the bars. I use mine to keep a heat deflector on the FHA vent. They're worlds stronger than the magnets that came with the deflector.
customer_reviews.author: TDHofstetter

customer_reviews.title: Only one who is worthy may possess the power of the magnets and all the strength they can harness.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and stronger than expected! Buyer beware that only one who is deemed worthy can pull these magnets apart to individual pieces. For that person that is considered worthy, will possess all the strength and power needed to place the magnets in just the right spot to secure the mightiest of metal objects. I called upon the gods to give me the strength and I failed, so I had to call upon my husband and test his worthiness in separating the magnets prior to using. The magnets chose him and for that I am grateful. For now they can fulfill their duty and hold the items I need in their rightful places!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia DiPietrantonio

customer_reviews.title: No for me
customer_reviews.text: I know that they're supposed to be super strong, and I read reviews of the following happening to many others... but they couldn't be anywhere near each other without the magnet forcing it back together, and ultimately shattering. We had such a hard time. But, they are very strong and if you use them carefully, they might work for you, but we returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Using these to hold small tooling on my stand - Once stuck to the stand, the tooling stays on the magnets perfectly. Like all magnets, these are fragile, just take care of not dropping or snapping on the metal and no issues at all. Great Magnet - very strong - packaged with spacers between them to assist in the separation of them Down side - the spacers are not very think, still very hard to separate - so strong that it becomes a challenge
customer_reviews.author: Cea JaysTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: They break!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are very strong and break and splinter VERY easily. They are essentially useless
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: They are very strong.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are really strong. Just be careful as they are mechanically not as strong as magnets. (which I think is a characteristic of most strong magnets, by the way). I use with my students, teens and high. Most get addicted to the power of these magnets and always ask me for pieces. So I purchased a second kit just to divide them in pieces and share with my students. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Paulo A. Borelli

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the size fool you
customer_reviews.text: Needed some strong magnets to keep a tarp attached to a metal railing. Was disappointed at first when received due to the small size. Well, these magnets are very strong. Had a hard time removing from package. Lol. They worked great for my needs. Tarp is secure, and has not blown off from strong winds as previous magnets had done.
customer_reviews.author: Keith in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: They shatter so easy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them less than a few hours and they’re half gone. They are brittle and break very very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Strong by themselvs, but consider what you are intending to hang?
customer_reviews.text: Powerful in by themselves. But not so when trying to go through or attach something. Tried attaching magnets through 1/8 inch fabric to steel/metal door. Will stick ok, but cannot handle any weight. Certainly not the weight as specified. I tried six magnets at several different points, angles and together, still could not hold up light weight. Magnets small and very narrow, 3/8 wide by 3/16 thick. dropped one and it broke in several pieces. May work for your projects, but certainly did not in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer44

customer_reviews.title: Break easy not durable
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged upon delivery got accused of not having product in pkg when returned
customer_reviews.author: Dos Vasos

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It took 6 of these magnets to hang up a 1 pound photo frame. I am disappointed that it took so many, but it's up and holding on. I broke one. You must slide them off and move them far away from the others. If they snap against each other, they will definitely break.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Crazy strong (not sure if that’s all good)
customer_reviews.text: This is super super super strong, almost dangerously strong that once in place, it’s almost impossible to move. The task of removing each piece from each other was hard enough. I wish I had bought a lesser strength. This is like military strength. Crazy strong
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Instantly broke
customer_reviews.text: These magnets looked great upon removal from the box. They took forever to actually separate. I thought they were going to be perfect. Unfortunately they snapped back together and the force of that caused them to crack and at the same time pinch my hand and give me a nasty blood blister. The blister is my own fault, but I feel they should have held up and not broken into a bunch of smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Baroldy

customer_reviews.title: Almost too freaking magnetic
customer_reviews.text: You've got to expend a good amount of force to remove each magnet from the other. You'll also need a really strong glue if you want to use these as fridge magnets, because they are HARD to remove. I've broken a couple in half and used them as-is. I should have used a good base to glue them in and use them as proper magnets for each use-case.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: VERY fragile
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnets as advertised but yes, they are probably closer to 12lb and they are extremely fragile. I broke 2 within 5 minutes of opening. I separated the top one and put it on my work surface. I then did the same with the next and the two on the surface were [apparently] not far enough apart. They drew together and one broke in half and the other shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fila

customer_reviews.title: Broke while trying to separate. STRONG but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very brittle, broke within 5 seconds of receiving it by pulling/sliding them apart! Save your money and buy thicker magnates. It’s been months since I returned these magnets...... I think it was in June. I don’t know why you say I haven’t returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindamarie

customer_reviews.title: should be listed as 2lbs of pull super weak not the 33lbs like advertised unless you put ...
customer_reviews.text: they say 33lbs but I have 1" sphere that is only 22lbs of pull and it pulls 20x harder then any of these magnets.. should be listed as 2lbs of pull super weak not the 33lbs like advertised unless you put all 10 together to get it ...
customer_reviews.author: Docjones

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are strong! Tough to pry them off each other, not sure what all the fuss is about w weight calibration,but it's strong enough to hold this heavy blanket on some weak chimney doors ( doors are slightly magnetized and thin). Served it's purpose!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong magnet. Might be my age but I had a difficult time getting them apart, but strong was what I was looking for. I have metal cabinets that are missing the small posts to keep them closed. I used the magnets to close the doors as the posts are impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: VOLFAN

customer_reviews.title: Hate
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are dangerous! They snapped my fingers about 3 times and caused blisters. Upon delivery of said magnets....they were chipped and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these magnets
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these magnets. I'm using them to mount a black towel to a metal window frame to keep the light out of my bedroom, and they work very well for that. Compact, powerful, and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets seem very strong, but I haven't actually tested their weight capacity, as my purposes don't require much weight. The sizes are as stated. Despite being very well packaged, one magnet was cracked in half/shattered upon opening the box. Since I'm only down one magnet, I'm just knocking off a star. I would have given five stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to separate
customer_reviews.text: These magnets should be separated prior to delivery. There was a a very thin black piece of material between each magnet. This did nothing to combat the force of the magnets. The power of these magnets when together are almost impossible to separate. I finally got them separated but not without breaking a few and cutting my finger in the process. I followed the instructions regarding sliding them off from one another. It is extremely difficult. Having said that, the magnets are strong as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use them as stud finders.
customer_reviews.text: They are like best of friends. They have magnetic personalities. Trying to take them apart is difficult and if you are not careful they will bite you. They are strong and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Great magnets! They are very strong, so be aware that they may be difficult to remove if you have them attached to something where it's hard to get a grip on them. That is exactly what I wanted, so they were perfect for my project!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Really Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these magnets in order to replace the magnets on my iron man helmet. They are incredibly strong. They only negative part about this is that they are too strong to stay on a plastic helmet with hot glue. I will try out super glue and hope the magnets stay connected with a strong glue. Otherwise the magnets work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: Strong but breakable.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and useful. I did break one the first time I used it, just by letting one slap back on the stack. The pamphlet did mention they are a bit brittle. Be sure to use them where you can slide them off of the surface. I'd imagine trying to pry would damage the magnet like the handling instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: EeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Strong but weak.
customer_reviews.text: The magnets have a very strong magnetic pull but are not physically strong. I had 3 of 10 break while taking apart. I dropped one and it broke. Two of them snapped together while laying them down on a table and both broke in to several pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are incredibly strong it will attract just about darn near everything. So for those who have any screws or pins in any part of their body, be careful because these will move them. Also, they are great for refrigerator magnets, and keeping tools organized on the workbench. I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: 44 lover

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: very powerful as stated. But just out of the box 2 pcs came broken. It still works for me as I set them side by side and it worked, and the instructions do say they are brittle, but arriving broken was something else. I am using these to hold a patio door shut. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen

customer_reviews.title: 60x10x5mm 33lbs pull better than 60x10x3 13lbs pull
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used 4 of these as a test to turn a used 1/2 hp single phase 240 volt induction motor into a small AC generator head. Project is unfinished but with just a hand spin of the shaft it produces 10+ volts. Preliminary results shows these magnets are what I needed. It would be nice if they were offered in lots of 50-100 which will be needed for my next project.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Reed

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED WITH A BROKEN MAGNET, BUT PACKAGING WAS GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: One of the ten magnets was broken in three pieces when I opened the package and another has a big crater in it. The packaging was excellent, so was this poor quality assurance/inspection or are these magnets just poor quality? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Tried using for my go pro and they stick so hard they brake... very dangerous in the hands of children, be cautious!!
customer_reviews.author: Braden Lange

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully they put thick plastic shims between the magnets. They would have been a pain in the butt to seperate without them. Great for automotive applications.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Powerful
customer_reviews.text: These are big ol' magnet strips that are really really strong. I had a hard time separating them, but that's kind of expected with magnets that are this strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer(?) or whoever put the magnets in the box forgot some of the spacers, so prying them apart and keeping them apart have been in a pain. Otherwise they work.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander The Great

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I put 3 magnets side by side to hold a GoPro camera to some metal. Stronger than I thought. I don't think the provided 3M tape is going to hold, but I know the magnets will stay in place...
customer_reviews.author: SkubySnak

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are amazing, I've never handled ones that were so powerful. I can think of all sorts of uses for these. They all arrived packaged well and all were intact.
customer_reviews.author: Barium5

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Strong Magnets!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! My daughter broke two of them as soon as they came out of the box, the whole group of magnets was ripped from her hand and stuck to my desk(metal legs were easily 6-9in from her hands at the time). Super strong
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Brittle, break easily, leave sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Brittle and broke easily leaving extremely sharp edges which due to the strength of the magnets can easily snap back and cut you when you try to separate them. These should come with a warning. Useless to me as although they are magnetically strong, the material they are made of is not.
customer_reviews.author: Smackie

customer_reviews.title: So strong!
customer_reviews.text: Fingers, watch out!! These things will snap shut. I wont let kids play with them, because its too strong for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: batrat

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to hold down the edges of my diamond canvas while I’m working on them. They work better than I hoped even helped me flatten out the kinks.
customer_reviews.author: Mi’Lady

customer_reviews.title: Avoid like the plague.
customer_reviews.text: These are too fragile for use... They break apart just trying to separate... Many of the reviews have to be fake...
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Strong But Broken
customer_reviews.text: Really strong for the size. Used them on my front gate because my dogs kept pushing them open. Got Cane Corso’s so strong dogs. Anyways they worked keeping them from pawing at it til it opened. So worked out great. Only thing is I received 3 of them broke to pieces already.!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy’s

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet. Magnet is so strong can’t get them off fridge. Not sure 3m tape is enough to stick them to hold hammers or other large tools but a quality magnet.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: The snap and break Bad!! Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! The product cracks and breaks, Yes they are that bad. How a magnet can snap in half and be made with poor material.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are surprisingly strong. They take some effort to remove from a metal surface. They will hold up most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: There are better options friends
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold nearly as much weight as I thought it would! I would spend my money somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jo Makulowich

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG
customer_reviews.text: These magnets do the job nicely. They are very strong. When they are all stacked together, I have to get my husband to separate them for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Can't separate
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed at how these where packaged. They should have been easier to separate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Magnetized!
customer_reviews.text: Careful they are super hard to pull apart once they are stuck together... and they can break, of course i dropped it twice on concrete before it finally broke in half. That ended up being just what I needed since a full one was too magnetic for my use.
customer_reviews.author: michi

customer_reviews.title: STRONG
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets, If I have a purpose, I will definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Galicz

customer_reviews.title: these are mmoderatly strong,
customer_reviews.text: worked well for my project. but i did break one. don't bang them, not metal
customer_reviews.author: robert k

customer_reviews.title: Break too easy
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product because they very easily break and are very hard to pull apart, because magnets are so strong. Have to slide them to get them off. Accidentally let the magnets slip and they create sparks and shatter.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy D.

customer_reviews.title: It is strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for mostly for organizing quick access to my tools. It holds neatly all my screw drivers now while giving me easy access to them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: They hold!
customer_reviews.text: I looked every where for powerful magnets and then bing! I thought to search Amazon. And there they were. I use them on all sorts of things. They are amazingly strong!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Letteer

customer_reviews.title: Super strong. SUPER BRITTLE.
customer_reviews.text: They must've made these particular magnets out of porcelain. I've broken 3 so far. Although, I suppose now I do have more of them, smaller though. 😏
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cossner  (no relation)

customer_reviews.title: Need directions inserted into package
customer_reviews.text: They are really strong magnets and they came with NO directions for how to separate. Didn't see the instructions on the Amazon website until just now. We broke 3 of them getting them separated and both cut ourselves in the process. Poor direction, good magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Iannarone

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic force
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are super strong, but they are very small. They will hold some of the light tools fine. Not brittle at all. Maybe the earlier versions were, but these look sturdy. Already dropped them few times but none of them broke,
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: love them, I use them to hold my knitting ...
customer_reviews.text: magnets so strong can badly pull apart, metal can get close & it scoops it up, love them, I use them to hold my knitting patterns up on board, does not slip, can barely pull sheet out from under, will buy more as backup,because anything that REALLY works, they quit selling
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: super strong
customer_reviews.text: only problem that we had was that these will break pretty easily. Not a problem for us since you can just stick them together. Very strong magnets. We used them to hold up a 4' x 8' white board and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for kids
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd read the reviews more carefully before getting these for a 6 year old to experiment with magnetism. They are incredibly dangerous for a kid. They snap together and pinch skin, and when they shatter (which is inevitable if you aren't very adult-level careful), they are sharp and the shards go flying. Plus, those shards are still very strong magnets, so not something to leave lying around.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Too strong to pull apart
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the individual bars pulled apart. Returned the product
customer_reviews.author: Bethany V.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: They break very easily. I read the reviews and was aware that they are fragile. I didn't think they'd be this fragile though. I bought 2 boxes and already broke nearly an entire box just trying to use them. I'll get magnetic hooks or something next time.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the MOST powerful magnets I have ever seen!! I would highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: ck1010

customer_reviews.title: Extremely strong, but fragile
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are extremely strong and are hard to pull apart. My only issue is that when dropped, this magnets are very brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Zygote

customer_reviews.title: A 3.5 star...
customer_reviews.text: These magnets were crazy strong but they snapped in half fairly easily. Not sure if that's commonplace but they worked for what I needed. Just seemed brittle for such a strong magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are strong magnetically but durability wise they are awful. These magnets broke and crumbled just trying to get them apart to use. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My only complaint is that they have a tendency to break into pieces if you drop them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I expected but really strong
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use as magnets to hold pictures on the refrigerator and they do that really well. Almost too well because they are really strong and they are hard to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids school project. Worked great and super strong. They are fragile though and a few of them broke while playing with and admiring their sheer strength. Liked them so much that we salvaged them from the project and now using them all over and for many different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they can break if dropped
customer_reviews.text: I knew they were going to be brittle but I thought the outer metal cover would handle the two magnets bounceing into each other...they broke...but the strength of the magnets was impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: They are in fact magnets
customer_reviews.text: They are magnets, exactly as ordered. What can you say
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use the magnets to attach heavy slate to the back glass of my fish tank. {works much better than suction cups}
customer_reviews.author: Ted Hangarter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the magnets snapped in half when I was using it. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Charmanderx

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Very strong magnets. Be careful with them and keep them away from your credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Overkill
customer_reviews.text: Way too strong, am having trouble pulling them apart with my hands. Almost damaged my fingers handling these magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Clawdy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: These are actually hard to pull apart. I used them to keep a thick plastic stuck to the side of a wheel barrel. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Household of 3

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are good and powerful I’ll buy them again if needed
customer_reviews.author: HEOS

customer_reviews.title: Not N45
customer_reviews.text: An N45 magnet in this size should have a surface field in excess of 0.4 Tesla. This one measures at just above 0.2 Tesla.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Best magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are the strongest magnets that I have found. Recommend to all who need strong magnets
customer_reviews.author: Doc13

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are really strong and came perfectly packaged. However, the first two I've tried using attracted each other from a small (~4 inches) distance and broke in half. Another one cracked when clashed against another magnet. It was hard using the magnets without breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Conrado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnet
customer_reviews.text: I will be purchasing more! These were just the magnet I needed for my project!!
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

product_meta.title: Powerful Neodymium Bar Magnets, Rare-Earth Metal Neodymium Magnet, N52, Incredibly Strong 33 LB Strength - 60 x 10 x 5 mm, Pack of 10
feature_bullets: MAGNETS COATED - Ni+Cu+Ni Triple Layer Coated. The Best Coating Available, which Provides a Shiny and Rust Resistant Protection for the Magnets.
POWERFUL MAGNETS - Made of Strongest Magnetic Material! Strong Holding Power, Holding Power is not Less than 33 lbs per Magnet with Direct Touch and Direct Pull.
MAGNETS DIMENSIONS - 60mm x 10mm x 5 mm (approx. 2.36" x 0.4" x 0.2").
DIY PROJECTS & SCIENCE EXPERIMENTS - Refrigerator Magnets, Shower Door, Work or Office, Scientific Purposes, Arts and Crafts or School Classroom.

WARNING - The bar magnet is very fragile, it is forbidden to collide with other metal objects (including another magnet), so be careful when you are trying separte them !WARNING - The bar magnet is very fragile, it is forbidden to collide with other metal objects (including another magnet), so be careful when you are trying separte them !
